traits.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two attacks with its scimitar. The second attack has disadvantage.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 3 (1d6 damage) piercing damage.
